description:
## Hands-on
### Task
1. Given the CSV files with data from bike stations, districts and neighbourhoods. Generate subjects with class ***esbici:EstacionBicicleta***, ***own:District*** and ***own:Neighbourhood***.

2. Complete the resources with the following characteristics. Bike stations have the data properties ***dct:identifier***, ***own:capacity***, ***own:hasAddress***, ***geo:lat*** and ***geo:long***. Districts and neighbourhoods have the ***owl:sameAs*** object property that relates the resource to WikiData and the ***dct:identifier*** and ***own:name*** data properties . Neighbourhoods have the object property ***own:hasDistrict***.

3. Link resources from the districts file to the bikeStations file using the ***own:hasNeighbourhood*** predicate.

Remeber to use this URI pattern "http://sample.com/resource/*className*/*resourceIdentifier*" for the three different types of resources.
### CSV files content
#### bikeStations
| ID | HOOD_ID | STREET | CAPACITY | LONGITUDE | LATITUDE |
| -- | -- | -- | -- | -- | -- |
| 1 | 16 | CALLE DE ALCALA | 60 | -3.701998 | 40.4171107 |
| 2 | 15 | CALLE DE MIGUEL MOYA | 24 | -3.7056739 | 40.42058 |
| 3 | 72 | PLAZA DEL CONDE DEL VALLE DE SUCHIL | 18 | -3.7072122 | 40.4303224 |
| 4 | 15 | CALLE DE MANUELA MALASAÑA | 24 | -3.7026739 | 40.4285905 |
| 5 | 14 | CALLE DE FUENCARRAL | 27 | -3.7020743 | 40.428362 |
#### districts
| DISTRICT_ID | DISTRICT_NAME | WIKIDATA_DISTRICT | NEIGHBOURHOOD_ID | NEIGHBOURHOOD_NAME | WIKIDATA_NEIGHBOURHOOD |
| -- | -- | -- | -- | -- | -- |
| 1 | Centro | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q1763376 | 16 | Sol | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q2465181 |
| 1 | Centro | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q1763376 | 16 | Sol | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q2465181 |
| 1 | Centro | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q1763376 | 15 | Universidad | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q10387767 |
| 7 | Chamberí | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q1763370 | 72 | Arapiles | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q10856744 |
| 1 | Centro | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q1763376 | 15 | Universidad | http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q10387767 |

> The CSV files of the exercise have been created from the [bases_bicimad.csv](https://datos.madrid.es/portal/site/egob/menuitem.c05c1f754a33a9fbe4b2e4b284f1a5a0/?vgnextoid=e9b2a4059b4b7410VgnVCM2000000c205a0aRCRD&vgnextchannel=374512b9ace9f310VgnVCM100000171f5a0aRCRD&vgnextfmt=default) document published by the Madrid City Council and updated on 05/01/2021
